notes.text: SmartControls: Keyboard Shortcut Documentation articles are now correct
SmartControls: Keyboard Shortcut Documentation articles are now correct
ControlFactoryBase: support config enabledMultiSelectionPlugin on value help create
SmartField now reads criticality from ConnectedFields annotation
SmartTable: Hide description fields in P13n dialog
SmartField now supports rendering ObjectStatus from annotations for semantically connected fields
FilterBar: Filters of type DynamicDateRange in Error state are now correctly cleared
SmartField: creation of instances for date time no longer sets UTC flag to false
SmartTable: groupBy mismatch sortProp/colKey
ValueListProvider: filterChange event is fired with correct value in case of Single Input and ValueList
SmartTable: Toggle Full screen on Table Parent invalidation
SmartField: zero guid is not exposed in edit mode
FilterBar: MultiComboBox tokens are no longer duplicated on opening adapt filters dialog
ValueHelpProvider: Absolute Path is now correctly encoded
Column menu ignores displayBehaviour without description
SmartChart: Control property is removed from SmartLink
SmartField: Ensuring flex library is loaded before loading Flex API's
SmartTable: now semantic dates are restored properly in personalization
SmartField: TextArrangement handling for NavigationProperty and TextOnly scenarios has been enhanced
SmartTable: DateRangeType Issues with Timezones
SmartChart: Control property is removed from SmartLink
SmartField: Ensuring flex library is loaded before loading Flex API's
SmartField Guid Type throwns validation error when key property missing in the model
SmartTable: now semantic dates are restored properly in personalization
SmartField: TextArrangement handling for NavigationProperty and TextOnly scenarios has been enhanced
SmartTable: DateRangeType Issues with Timezones
SmartChart: Control property is removed from SmartLink
SmartField: Ensuring flex library is loaded before loading Flex API's
SmartField Guid Type throwns validation error when key property missing in the model
SmartFilterBar: prevent calling ensureFilterLoaded on each onBeforeRendering
SmartTable: correct metadata retrieval when conditionTypeInfo is used
FilterBar: suspend items binding of not visible controls
We've now fixed the issue of inconsistent decimal digits shown in the smart charts
Personalization/ColumnsController: column freeze is correctly preserved when comes from variant
ValueHelpDialog: Add Condition button now has correct text and ScreenReader announcement
SmartFilterBar: validation for input is now correct and the value state is not overriden when not necessary
SmartForm: getConderserInfo method is now handles SmartForm control instance correctly
GroupElement's visibility property remains unchanged if its value is bound
SmartFilterBar: validation for input is now correct when same invalid value is entered and no error is thrown
SmartFilterBar: validation for input is now correct when same invalid value is entered and no error is thrown
SmartFilterBar: validation for input is now correct when same invalid value is entered
SmartFilterBar: Saving composite keys in the variant is now supported
GroupElement is now hidden when there are no visible children
